QuestData.Title: Cut Them Down
QuestData.Description: They steal children? Children?!$b$bHad you not rescued Kaz's child, he would be reduced to mulch just like the others.$b$bYou should send them a message they will understand. Cut down their great dew casters. Rip them apart.$b$bLet them know that it is not okay to take our children.
QuestData.RewardText: They are lucky you are the one that killed them. I would have tried to carve pictures in their dead wood bodies.
